posts.title: 每个人，都有一定程度的 “过目不忘”
【Nesp】Ospf 多区域
posts.text: 这是成果图【R1】system-view【R1】ospf 1【R1】network 10.0.12.0 0.0.0.255【R1】netowrk 10.0.13.0 0.0.0.255 【R2】system-view【R2】network 10.0.12.0 0.0.0.255【R2】network 10.0.24.0 0.0.0.255 【R3】system-view【R3】ospf 1【R3】network 10.0.13.0 0.0.0.255【R3】network 10.0.34.0 0.0.0.255【R3】network 10.0.3.0 0.0.0.255 【R4】system-view【R4】ospf 1【R4】area 0【R4】network 10.34.0 0.0.0.255【R4】network 10.24.0 0.0.0.255【R4】network 10.0.4.0 0.0.0.255 【R5】system-view【R5】ospf 1【R5】are 0【R5】network 10.34.0 0.0.0.255【R5】【R5】【R5】 Whatever code you want to show cout << endl;
